getPortfolioPositions: SELECT position.id, position.purchasedate, position.purchaseprice, position.quantity, product.name AS productname, product.weight AS fineweight, producttype.producttypename, product.weightunit, country.countryname, country.isoCode2 FROM position, product, portfolio, users, country, producttype WHERE position.portfolioid = portfolio.id AND product.id = position.productid AND portfolio.ownerid = users.id AND country.id = product.countryid AND producttype.id = product.producttypeid AND users.username = 'admin'
getPortfolioById: SELECT id, portfolioName, ownerId, createdAt, updatedAt FROM portfolio WHERE id = $1
getOrders: SELECT orders.id, orders.userid, users.username, orders.type, orders.orderstatus, orders.custodyserviceid, custodyservice.custodyservicename, orders.createdat, orders.updatedat, order_items.productid, order_items.productname, order_items.quantity, order_items.unitprice, order_items.totalprice FROM orders JOIN users ON users.id = orders.userid LEFT JOIN order_items ON orders.id = order_items.orderid LEFT JOIN custodyservice ON orders.custodyserviceid = custodyservice.id ORDER BY orders.createdat DESC
